Detailed Rubrics:
+1: Properly set up additional layouts
+1: Properly set up vocabulary adding dialog
+1: Properly set up vocabulary exporting dialog

+1: Can add a word with manual entry
+2: Can add multiple words with meanings automatically fetched
+1: Can import by exported data
+2: Can export one or multiple vocabulary meanings

+1: Add Merriam-Webster Dictionary API
+1: Add Oxford Dictionary of English API
+1: If all API keys are not exposed

-1: If a GUI React Component is not covered
-0.5: If a library function is not tested
